atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which layer a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 directive for defining theme variables inline.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 directive for creating custom variants.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Use @config to specify which config file Tailwind should use when compiling that CSS file.
